plot: It starts with a live radio broadcast from the Bikini Atoll a few days before it is annihilated by a nuclear test. Shows great footage from these times and tells the story of the US Navy ...
title: "The American Experience" Radio Bikini

cast.role: Himself - Veteran of nuclear weapons tests at Bikini Atoll in 1946
cast.name: John Smitherman
